duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage multiple cross-functional projects impacting the company's financial and operational success.
Promote the company's expertise and services to new and existing facilities and organizations.
Drive growth and profitability through effective project execution and continuous improvement of department systems and processes.
Manage, mentor, and develop a team of 5-20 reports, including work assignments, hiring, and performance appraisals.
Develop appropriate bids and estimates, review contractual requirements, and ensure schedule requirements are met for all projects.
Interact with customers to validate expectations, coordinate invoicing and change orders, and manage relationships for winning projects.
Coordinate and manage work across multiple projects, ensuring adherence to best practices in project management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
